p.s: now we can see how many consequences the climate change has.
The sea levels rised a lot and because of that many coastal areas are not there anymore.
We have new dessertsdeserts and often extreme weather events like hurricanes, droughts and wildfires.
Today I heard the speech which you delivered at the COP26 World Leaders' Summit Opening Ceremony on 1 November 2021.
Now nearly 30 years later your thoughts from 2021 are reality.
You said that future generations will be angry if the politicians will not do something against climate change.
My children often asksask me why we have not done something against global warming in the earlier times.
And I cannot give them an answer.
I know that in 2021 it was clear that it is important to act and to change a lot.
Everybody has known that global warming has bad consequence and that it already effectsaffects our lives.
Even though we all known it we did not do enough to decrease global warming.
Now my children have to suffer because the politicians failed.
The climate change restricts their life.
They cannot understand it.
It makes them angry.
They judge us for that.
It is a conflict between generations.
You were totally right.
We had the ideas, the technology, the bankers, the corporations and the NGOs but our will was not strong.
I know we changed something to fight again the climate crisis but it was not enough.
Scientists warned us and told us that it is not enough.
Nevertheless it was not real enough to have to will to change more.
Now the consequences are much worse and because of that our will is stronger.
But it will take us years till the climate will become better.
Although we somehow failed, I think COP26 was important.
It changed something and was the beginning of acting against global warming.
I just was not enough.
I think your speech helped to convince and encourage people to take action against climate change.
In my opinion that is important.
Although we did not reach the 1.5 degree goal, I have still hope that one time the climate will be better.
